DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect different dos tiotropium deliver HandiHaler Respimat device lung function . Additionally , study investigate pharmacokinetic profile different dos . Studying pharmacokinetic profile show happen medication body period hour provide information potential effect medication .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . All patient must sign informed consent consistent IInternational Conference Harmonisation Good Clinical Practice ( ICHGCP ) guideline local legislation prior studyrelated procedure , include medication washout restriction . 2 . Relatively stable , moderate severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) 3 . Current exsmokers ( smoke history least 10 pack year ) 4 . Able perform lung function test 5 . Able use study inhaler Exclusion criterion : 1 . Significant disease COPD 2 . Recent myocardial infarction , unstable lifethreatening cardiac arrhythmia , hospitalisation cardiac failure . 3 . Malignancy require resection , radiation therapy chemotherapy within last 5 year 4 . History asthma , lifethreatening pulmonary obstruction , cystic fibrosis clinically evident bronchiectasis 5 Active tuberculosis 6 . History alcohol drug abuse 7 . Pulmonary resection 8 . Recent completion pulmonary rehabilitation program current participation continue 9 . Daytime oxygen therapy 1 hour per day . 10 . Use investigational drug , restriction use respiratory medication study period . 11 . Current participation another clinical trial 12 . Pregnant nursing woman 13 . Women childbearing potential use highly effective method contraception ( e.g : implant , injectable , oral contraceptive )
